resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75456</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75456</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660f-09fc-40e5-2d27-5bc21b5fd5a0#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Léda és a hattyú.</string>
            <string language="en">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Leda and the Swan.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Leda und der 
Schwan.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Michaël Angelo Buonarotti : Leda et le 
cygne.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Leda e a cisne.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Leda e lo swan.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Θ*Λεδα και ο 
κύκνος.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Michelangelo Buonarotti: Leda y el cisne.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A művész a festményt Alfonso, ferrarai herceg megrendelésére készítette el.</string>
            <string language="en">The artist created this painting after the ordering of Alfonso, duke of Ferrara.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Alfonso,  Léda,  hattyú,  Michelangelo,  reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">Alfonso, Leda, swan, Michelangelo, the Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nach der Einrichtung von Alfonso der Künstler erstellte 
diesen Anstrich, Herzog von Ferrara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'artiste a créé cette peinture après la commande 
d'Alfonso, duc de Ferrare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O artista criou esta pintura após requisitar de Alfonso, 
duque de Ferrara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'artista ha creato questa pittura dopo l'ordinamento di 
Alfonso, duca di Ferrara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καλλιτέχνης δημιούργησε αυτήν την ζωγραφική μετά 
από τη διαταγή του Alfonso, δούκας της φερράρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El artista creó esta pintura después de ordenar de 
Alfonso, duque de Ferrara.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alfonso, Leda, Schwan, Michelangelo, die Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Alfonso, Leda, cygne, Michaël Angelo, la Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alfonso, Leda, cisne, Michelangelo, o renascimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alfonso, Leda, swan, Michelangelo, la rinascita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Αλφονσο, Leda, κύκνος, Michelangelo, η αναγέννηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alfonso, Leda, cisne, Michelangelo, el renacimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75456</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40b2660f-09fc-40e5-2d27-5bc21b5fd5a0&v=1&b=4</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
